roleset.name: make organized, orderly arrangment, having a systematic, efficient (maybe unified) structure
roleset.note: ORGANIZE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, Comparison with 'create'. Member of VNcls create-26.4, establish-55.5-1, force-59-1. (from organize.01-v)
ORGANIZATION-N NOTES: By Julia based on nouns-00080, 'organize-v.01'. Corresponds to VNcls create-26.4, establish-55.5-1. (from organization.01-n)
ORGANIZED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, organize.01. Corresponds to VNcls create-26.4, establish-55.5-1, force-59-1. (from organized.01-j)

roles.note: organize-v.01 has arg3 benefactive. Use ArgM-GOL if this comes up. (from organization.01-n)

role.descr: organizer, entity with good organizational skills
thing organized, domain in which arg0 has good skills

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Several Big Board firms are organizing to complain about program trading and the exchange's role in it.
example.arg: to complain about program trading and the exchange's role in it

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Fournier said that as Navigation Mixte chairman, he-1 is prohibited by takeover regulations from *trace*-1 organizing his own defense or doing anything besides managing current company business.

example.name: one kind of end state
example.text: The figures exclude businesses-1 now organized *trace*-1 as American Express Information Services Co.
example.arg: as American Express Information Services Co

example.name: clearer start and end states
example.text: John organized his desk from a full-blown disaster area into a tidy collection of piles.
example.arg: into a tidy collection of piles

example.name: missing arg3
example.text: his organization of his papers from a messy pile into neat stacks on his desk
example.arg: into neat stacks on his desk

example.name: arg0
example.text: And as far as an Islamic revolution is concerned i would say that it depends on how organized religious or clerical organizations are in a country and how politicized they are .

example.name: args 0, 4
example.text: We are organized as a union of free lance workers, who come together in order to maintain a stable market for our services, and in our unity, we gain strength.
example.arg: as a union of free lance workers

example.name: args 0, 1; good organizational skills and domain
example.text: She is organized in her goal-setting, yet has learned to keep her options open for the future.

example.name: standard arg1
example.text: The Bootcamp was well organized and structured.
